item.title: Pulmonary Archery
item.description: [[songs/p/peter_murphy/deep/cuts_you_up.md#ohohoohah-vyl-wnanory|It’s never too late to be early or to try]] [[songs/p/peter_murphy/deep/cuts_you_up.md#ohohoohah-vyl-wnanory|and maintain some scrap of integrity and certainty I guess.
